author: WinInsider
body: I have cmdlet using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore version 2.2.1 ... Cmdlet project target .net standard 2.0 ... Can such cmdlet execute under PowerShell Core 6.1 (which runs on .net core 2.1.5)?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Yes, PowerShell Core targets NetCoreApp 2.1 so targeting to .Net Standard 2.0 will work.

title: Cmdlet with 2.2.1 assemblies running from PowerShell Core 6.1
